column5: Often known as the science of uncertainty, statistics is of vital importance in modern society where almost all sectors rely on the collection, analysis and interpretation of data. There is a great shortage of well qualified statisticians, data analysts and statistical consultants across the sector and this course has been specifically designed to meet that demand.
column7: UK students Full-time students:£10,500 Part-time students: £70 per taught credit  EU/International students Full-time students: £15,700 Part-time students: £101 per taught credit
